title: React Native Developers
tagsAndSkills: Performance tuning,github,Mobile development,User interface designing,UML,QA Professional,E-commerce,Android SDK
jobDescription:
Develop, Deploy, Test - React Native apps independently

  • Knowledge and experience in React Native app framework.
  • Hands-on experience in using Restful APIs.
  • Hands-on experience in designing and developing micro-services architecture and containers.
  • Object-oriented analysis, UML, and design using common design patterns.
  • Hands-on experience in development IDE Android Studio, Android SDK, Firebase Test Lab.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
  • Familiarity with push notifications.
  • Familiarity with IOS integration with React Native.
  • Experience using GitHub or a similar environment.
  • Complete understanding of SDLC.
  • Experience with Agile development.
  • Experience with Material Design and Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices.
  • Good knowledge of adding third-party libraries.
  • A track record of delivering successful complex consumer product apps (finance apps, e-commerce apps).
  • Release applications to the Apple and Google Play stores.
  • Work with native modules when required.
  • Work as part of a small team, which will include other React Native developers, a project manager, a QA professional, and a designer.


Requirements

  • 1+ years of professional experience working with React Native.
  • 2+ years of professional software development experience.
  • Freshers are welcome with Mobile Development knowledge.
  • Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon, both in regards to estimates and to the general process.
  • Knowledge of Angular will be a plus.
  • You work well within a team environment and enjoy working in the office with your colleagues.

title: iOS Developer
tagsAndSkills: iOS,iOS development,Git,Core Graphics,ios developer,Cocoa Framework,RESTful APIs,Core Animation
jobDescription:
5+ years of experience in iOS development with Swift.
Strong experience in building iOS mobile applications
Skills for technical requirements gathering and presenting.
Proven experience with one or more apps published in the App Store
Knowledge of Apple's design principles and application interface guidelines
Experience working with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, Core Graphics and Core Text.
Strong understanding of iOS application architecture and implementation (MVVM).
Understanding of iOS design principles and interface guidelines.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git.
Strong knowledge of mobile SDKs, different iOS versions, and handling different screen sizes
Proficiency with Xcode, Instruments, Swift, Cocoa Framework and Push Notifications
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
Experience with 3rd Party CocoaPods implementation/updating.
Proficiency in implementing encryption and decryption mechanisms within iOS applications.
Good problem-solving and communication skills, both verbal and written.

title: Urgent Opening For DIY Profile-Thane
jobDescription:
Job description

Urgent Opening For DIY Profile

Freshers can also apply with stock market knowledge and good communication skills.



Job brief:


We are looking for an enthusiastic Telesales Representative to contribute to generating sales for our company. You will be responsible for closing sales deals over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships. An effective telesales representative must be an excellent communicator and have superior people skills. They must be comfortable presenting products or services over the phone as well as dealing with complaints and doubts. The goal is to help the company grow by bringing in customers and developing business.


Responsibilities:


  • Contact potential customers to inform them about the account using scripts
  • Answer questions about products or the company
  • Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close sales
  • Enter and update customer information in the system database
  • Take and process orders in an accurate manner
  • Handle grievances to preserve the companys reputation
  • Go the extra mile to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales
  • Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information

Requirements:


  • Graduate in any stream
  • Good knowledge of stockbroking business
  • Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects
  • Excellent knowledge of English
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection
  • Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints
  • Past experience of working as telesales representative and track record of successfully meeting the sales quota preferably over the phone will be a plus
  • Candidates residing in Navi Mumbai or Thane and nearby places will only be considered.

Kindly confirm your participation for the same by replying to this mail and forward your updated resume. on the below mail id


bhagyashree.karpe@kotak.com

Contact no: Direct - +91 022 42858419


Thanks & Regards

HR Team

Kotak Securities Ltd

title: Procurement Executive
jobDescription:
Responsible for

- MDM activities

- Vendor registration as per Reliance compliance standard

- Ordering & tracking deliveries inline with new product launch plan

- Sorting vendor / logistics issues related to Food material supplies.

- Review of requirement and consumption pattern and updating procurement master periodically.

- Internal co-ordination for quick resolution of any issue related to store billing , MDM , shelf life

- Ordering & tracking of food material required for stores inline with new launches & average consumption pattern

- Inventory control & avoid any wastages due to over ordering or unauthorized purchases.

- Tracking , Monitoring new store launches & highlight red alert for any delay. Initiating corrective actions subsequently to meet scheduled store opening plan.

title: Nautical Training Faculty - Master (Bulk / Chemical)

ambitionBoxData.Title: Executive Ship Management Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

  • To provide training and implementation of quality standards in assigned training courses.
  • Carry out skill based and technical training to officers on various shipboard operations.
  • Conduct Simulator based training at different competence levels.
  • Preparation of course documentation and various training exercises.
  • Prepare the training course documentation after the completion of the course.
  • Updating and revising of course Master files, participants handout, prepare use and update PPTs, relevant videos, exercises, tests, incorporating new regulations, best industry practices and new training material received.
  • Handling of non-compliances . To identify and record all deficiencies related to training activities
  • Conduct Verification and review of courses and review and discuss course participants feedback.

Preferred candidate profile


  • Marine Engineer Officer Class 1 COC. Master Mariner salied on Containers / Bulk Carrier.
  • With min. 1 year rank experience as mentioned above (Preference for experience on LNG/ LPG/ Tanker vessels)
  • Experience in Ship operation, ship repair, teaching, auditing, inspections preferred.
  • Training for Trainers and Assessors (TOTA) or Vertical Integration Course for Trainers (VICT).
  • Other ISO / ISM / Technical Value-added courses.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Should be interested in modern teaching methodologies.
  • Candidate must have a passion for learning continuously and a desire to be in the teaching profession.
  • Proficient in use of computers and savvy with use of various software
